job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: We are hiring senior developers for my US/Canada team with <br>- experience in workflow engines like Camunda, Airflow, etc.<br>- proficient in design and implementation of microservices-based, API/Endpoint architectures.<br>- strong background in designing and developing event-based/pub-sub workflows & digestion engines.<br>- Proficiency with 2 or more programming languages like Java, Go, Node.js, Scala or similar<br>- Expertise in Kafka at scale and working experience with No-SQL DBs<br>- Good understanding of AWS development and deployment
